# qirp

qirp is a package of common helper functions for use in the Queen's Institutional Research and Planning to help team members work more effectively and efficiently in their day-to-day work

## Installation

You can install the development version of qirp from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jkaupp/qirp")
```
